    • 方法摘要

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and 描述
      private void initKVServer(MetaData metaData)
      Initialize the KVServer with the meta-data and block it for client requests, all client requests are rejected with an SERVER_STOPPED error message; ECS requests have to be processed.
      private void lockWrite()
      Lock the KVServer for write operations
      private void moveData(java.lang.String range, java.lang.String server)
      Transfer a subset (range) of the KVServervs data to another KVServer (reallocation before removing this server or adding a new KVServer to the ring)?
      private java.lang.String receive() 
      void run() 
      private void send(java.lang.String send_message)
      send data to client
      private void shutDown()
      Exits the KVServer application
      private void start()
      Starts the KVServer, all client requests and all ECS requests are processed
      private void stop()
      Stops the KVServer, all client requests are rejected and only ECS requests are processed.
      private void unLockWrite()
      Unlock the KVServer for write operations.
      private void update(MetaData metaData)
      Update the meta-data repository of this server

        public void run()

        run 接口 {1} 中的 {0} java.lang.Runnable

      • initKVServer

        private void initKVServer(MetaData metaData)
        Initialize the KVServer with the meta-data and block it for client requests, all client requests are rejected with an SERVER_STOPPED error message; ECS requests have to be processed.
        参数：
        metaData -

      • start

        private void start()
        Starts the KVServer, all client requests and all ECS requests are processed

      • stop

        private void stop()
        Stops the KVServer, all client requests are rejected and only ECS requests are processed.

      • shutDown

        private void shutDown()
        Exits the KVServer application

      • lockWrite

        private void lockWrite()
        Lock the KVServer for write operations

      • unLockWrite

        private void unLockWrite()
        Unlock the KVServer for write operations.

      • moveData

        private void moveData(java.lang.String range,
            java.lang.String server)
        Transfer a subset (range) of the KVServervs data to another KVServer (reallocation before removing this server or adding a new KVServer to the ring)? send a notification to the ECS, if data transfer is completed.
        参数：
        range -
        server -

      • update

        private void update(MetaData metaData)
        Update the meta-data repository of this server
        参数：
